traits.Formation Tactics: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, grappled, or restrained while it is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

actions.Multiattack: The soldier makes two melee attacks.
actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.
